subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[carry]]; to [[bear]]
# to [[take]] [[along]]; to [[take]] somebody by the [[hand]]
# to [[lead]] by [[hand]]
# to [[co-operate]]; [[hand in hand]]
# {{w|King Xie of Zhou|King Xie}} of the [[Zhou]] [[dynasty]]
